Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
printer
<printer> A {peripheral} device for producing text and images on paper. There are many different types, broadly grouped into "{impact printers}" and "{non-impact printers}".
Compare {plotter}. See also {Braille printer}, {tree-killer}.
(1996-01-13)

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Printer \Print"er\, n. One who prints; especially, one who prints books, newspapers, engravings, etc., a compositor; a typesetter; a pressman. [1913 Webster]
{Printer's devil}, {Printer's gauge}. See under {Devil}, and {Gauge}.
{Printer's ink}. See {Printing ink}, below. [1913 Webster]

printer n 1: someone whose occupation is printing [syn: {pressman}] 2: (computer science) an output device that prints the results of data processing 3: a machine that prints [syn: {printing machine}]
